code: var getDataFromServer=function getDataFromServer(type,handleSuccess){fetch("https://storage.googleapis.com/realtour/".concat(type),{method:'GET'}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(success){return handleSuccess(success);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};var postDataOnServer=function postDataOnServer(type,data,handleSuccess){fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/".concat(type),{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{"Content-type":"application/json; charset=UTF-8"}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(success){return handleSuccess(success);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};var editDataFromServer=function editDataFromServer(type,data,handleSuccess){fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/".concat(type,"/").concat(data.id),{method:'PUT',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{"Content-type":"application/json; charset=UTF-8"}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(success){return handleSuccess(success);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};export{getDataFromServer,postDataOnServer,editDataFromServer};
